# Reference

## Table of Contents

**Defined types**

* [`environment_variable::path_element`](#environment_variablepath_element): Environment_variable::Path_element  Add an element to the path.  Can be called multiple times to allow the path to be built progressively
* [`environment_variable::variable`](#environment_variablevariable): Environment_variable::Variable  Manage an environment variable with Puppet.

## Defined types

### environment_variable::path_element

Environment_variable::Path_element

Add an element to the path.  Can be called multiple times to allow the path to
be built progressively

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `environment_variable::path_element` defined type.

##### `path`

Data type: `Any`

The path element to add to $PATH

Default value: $title

##### `ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present','absent']`

Whether to add or remove this element

Default value: present

### environment_variable::variable

Environment_variable::Variable

Manage an environment variable with Puppet.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `environment_variable::variable` defined type.

##### `variable`

Data type: `Any`

The name of the variable to manage

Default value: $title

##### `value`

Data type: `Any`

The value to set the variable to

Default value: `undef`

##### `ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present','absent']`

Whether to add or remove the variable

Default value: present
